mapper.select: select * from room where custom_id = #{custom_id} order by room_code desc LIMIT #{page},4
select count(*) from room where custom_id=#{id}
select c.custom_name,r.room_name,r.room_day,r.room_block,r.room_code from custom c inner join (select * from room ) r on c.custom_id = r.custom_id order by room_code desc Limit #{page},10
mapper.update: update room set room_block=#{room_block} where room_code = #{room_code}
mapper.select: select room_img from room_img where room_img_code in (select min(room_img_code) from room_img where room_code=#{room_code})
